names.english: heart spleen and kidney quieting decoction
names.commonEnglish: Heart, Spleen and Kidney Quieting Decoction

actions: Powerfully tonifies Yuan Qi, tonifies Spleen and Stomach Qi, tonifies Heart Qi, calms the Spirit and treats impotence.
With Bai Zhu, tonifies the transformation and transportation functions of the Spleen.
Tonifies the Spleen and augments Qi.
Calms the Spirit, sedates the Heart and clears the channel joining the Heart and Kidney.
With Suan Zao Ren, balances the contrasting, introverted and dispersing, extroverted manifestations of Spirit to ensure the proper balance of openness and sobriety.
With Fu Shen and Suan Zao Ren, for irritability, disorientation, palpitations, anxiety and insomnia due to Heart Blood Deficiency or Qi Stagnation.
Nourishes Heart Yin, tonifies Liver Blood and calms the Spirit.
Quiets the Heart, calms the Spirit and soothes the nerves.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang and increases the libido.
Tonifies the Kidneys and strengthens Yang.
Reinforces and Benefits the Heart and Spleen
syndromes: Heart Blood and Spleen Qi Deficiency

symptoms: Distention and fullness of the epigastrium and abdomen after meals
